gotham_bank_heist.title: The Gotham Bank Heist
gotham_bank_heist.description: A chaotic but clever heist at Gotham's First National Bank.

arkham_breakout.title: The Arkham Asylum Breakout
arkham_breakout.description: A key psychologist has gone missing during a suspiciously timed riot at Arkham.

CryoResidueFound.label: Was there cryogenic residue on site?

gcpd_sabotage.title: The GCPD Sabotage
gcpd_sabotage.description: The Bat-Signal has been sabotaged and confidential GCPD files have been encrypted.

ComplexCipherUsed.label: Were the files locked with a complex cipher?

AntiEstablishmentMessage.label: Was an anti-establishment message left behind?

PsychologicalProfile.label: Did the attack seem designed to profile Batman?

fear_in_the_narrows.title: Fear in the Narrows
fear_in_the_narrows.description: A chemical agent causing mass panic has been released in the Narrows.

CausesPanicNotFear.label: Does the toxin cause chaotic panic instead of pure terror?

MindControlElement.label: Is there evidence of a mind-control component?

BurnMarksOnDispersal.label: Are there scorch marks at the dispersal sites?

iceberg_lounge_caper.title: The Iceberg Lounge Caper
iceberg_lounge_caper.description: A high-stakes illegal weapons deal was ambushed at the Iceberg Lounge.

CoinFoundAtScene.label: Was a two-headed coin found at the scene?

CleanGetaway.label: Was the heist remarkably clean and stealthy?

museum_mayhem.title: The Museum Mayhem
museum_mayhem.description: An ancient artifact stolen from the Gotham Museum. Security disabled with force.

LeagueOfAssassinsSign.label: Was the symbol of the League of Assassins found?

SecurityDisabledByForce.label: Was security disabled by sheer brute force?

SilentAndAcrobatic.label: Did the thief display silent, acrobatic prowess?

double_cross_at_docks.title: The Double-Cross at the Docks
double_cross_at_docks.description: A meeting between rival gangs erupted in violence. A third party intervened.

PerfectlySymmetricalCrime.label: Was the crime scene eerily symmetrical?

GoalWasChaosNotProfit.label: Does it appear the goal was simply to create chaos?

CrimeLordIntimidation.label: Was it a power play to intimidate other gangs?

ace_chemicals_conspiracy.title: The Ace Chemicals Conspiracy
ace_chemicals_conspiracy.description: An executive at Ace Chemicals has been murdered, and a formula stolen.

VictimHadGrinningSmile.label: Did the victim die with an unnatural, wide grin?

FormulaWasAnAccelerant.label: Was the stolen formula a powerful fire accelerant?

FormulaWasAPlantGrowth.label: Was the stolen formula a plant growth hormone?

wayne_tower_infiltration.title: The Wayne Tower Infiltration
wayne_tower_infiltration.description: The R&D lab at Wayne Tower was breached. A prototype is missing.

BypassedAdvancedSecurity.label: Was advanced security bypassed without a trace?

PersonalVendettaAgainstWayne.label: Does it seem like a vendetta against Bruce Wayne?

PerpetratorKnewLayout.label: Did the thief have intimate knowledge of the layout?

botanical_gardens_scare.title: The Botanical Gardens Scare
botanical_gardens_scare.description: Several citizens found catatonic in the Botanical Gardens covered in pollen.

VictimsControlledByPollen.label: Are victims controlled by a plant-based agent?

PollenCausedHallucinations.label: Does the pollen cause vivid hallucinations?

SceneIsWhimsicalAndStrange.label: Is the crime scene arranged in a whimsical manner?

the_last_laugh.title: The Last Laugh
the_last_laugh.description: The mayor was attacked with a strange, harmless prank that turned deadly.

PrankBasedAttack.label: Was the attack a deadly version of a classic prank?

ComplexRubeGoldberg.label: Was the attack an overly complex machine?

MotiveSeemsToBeAttention.label: Did the crime seem designed purely for attention?
